name: test_e2e_with_logs[010_SQLI_BLIND_006]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_BLIND_006` |
| **Name** | Time-based conditional blind injection |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | blind |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' AND IF((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users)>5,SLEEP(5),1) --`
- **Encoded**: `'%20AND%20IF((SELECT%20COUNT(*)%20FROM%20users)%3E5%2CSLEEP(5)%2C1)%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~21000ms
- **Timestamp**: 09:37:26.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Time-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_BLIND_006-1767433046414-tgjjx pattern_id=SQLI_BLIND_006 uri=/?q='%20AND%20IF((SELECT%20COUNT(*)%20FROM%20users)%3E5%2CSLEEP(5)%2C1)%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
09:37:26.000000000: Critical [NGINX SQLi] Time-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_BLIND_006-1767433046414-tgjjx pattern_id=SQLI_BLIND_006 uri=/?q='%20AND%20IF((SELECT%20COUNT(*)%20FROM%20users)%3E5%2CSLEEP(5)%2C1)%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
